From: Chas., To: Ruby D. Chandler

Miss Ruby D. Chandler 253 N. Estelle Ave. Wichita, Kansas

August 3 - 1910 Friend and Pal, Trusting you may enjoy many happy returns of this your 16th birthday. I am your friend, Chas. I am glad to know you are coming home. Most everything you can think of is stirring here. Give my regards to Aba Wean. Chas.
